text: Protected by the security of a house's barn, a goat saw a wolf passing by and began to insult him, mocking him widely. The wolf, calmly, replied: "Woe to you! I know it's not you who's insulting me, it's the place you're in. The occasion and the place can make us brave.
title: El lobo y el cabrito encerrado
author: nan Esopo
